name: Lil Duck Delivery
description:
Made for the MAGIC +  RGD Summertime Jam. Theme: Summertime

Deliver coffees before time runs out, lil duck!

// Controls //

Lil Duck moves automatically! Use WASD to pick a direction.

SPACE BAR drops coffee. Earn points by dropping coffee in front of or on customers.  They only last a few seconds and wasted coffee deducts time!

LEFT SHIFT does a kickflip.

Refill your coffees by going past the coffee shop.

// Team //

Denny McCorry - Art, Design, Programming

BC Likes You - Programming, Design, SFX

Nick Basch - Music
